name: REQ_TEST_REASON
description: Stores the reason for performing the test(s) on the requisition.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the requisition record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.description: Stores the reason for performing the test(s) on this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_TEST_REASON_CMT
columns.description: Comment associated with a requisition test reason.
